MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG6 postcode area of Kirkcudbright. We had no advance warning of this, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have located a broken electrical pole and a grounded conductor near to Culcaigrie Farm however there have been onsite difficulties and we now expect your supply to be restored by 2am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:33PM on Friday, 02 April 2021.
